ExecutableTestSuite.label: Soilwise Profile ETS
ExecutableTestSuite.description: The SoilWise Profile ETS is an executable test suite that validates metadata sets based on INSPIRE Soil for completeness.
ExecutableTestSuite.author: Thorsten Reitz

ParameterList.name: ETF Standard Parameters for XML test objects

TestModule.label: Default test module
TestModule.description: This is the default test module

TestStep.label: Test
TestStep.description: No description specified

TestAssertion.label: Test
TestAssertion.description: No description specified

TestStep.label: label
TestStep.description: Constraints TestCase for Feature Type with name 'CI_OnlineResource' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'

TestAssertion.label: TestAssertion
TestAssertion.description:

  • information
  • offlineAccess
  • order
  • search
